title: Implement Pass 2: Enhanced OS Detection (registry)
close_reason: Pass 2 Enhanced OS Detection fully implemented. Created python/utils/registry_reader.py for offline Windows Registry reading (supports hivex library and PowerShell methods). Rewrote python/core/os_detector.py with multi-method detection: registry-based (HIGH confidence), pattern-based (MEDIUM/LOW). Created python/inspection/pass2_os.py with EnhancedOSDetector class. Features: Reads HKLM\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion from offline drives, extracts ProductName, DisplayVersion, CurrentBuild, EditionID, InstallDate. Includes additional Windows analysis: user profiles, installed features, program counts. Works from both Windows native and WSL environments. JSON report format compatible with inspection workflow.
